conclusion: Consider principles of light and shadow for changes in object positions.
A is a white object on the ground.
B is a shadow cast by the mirror.
C is a shadow cast by the ring.

Shadow of the mirror will shift due to light source movement.
Shadow of the ring will shift due to light source movement.
Shadow of the mirror will move to a new position.
Shadow of the ring will move to a new position.

Shadow of the ring (C) will shift to a new position.
